Schedule of Events

We're still planning, but here's a general outline of the weekend! Check back soon for more details.



- Thursday, July 18 -

Kicking off with a cheers

For those arriving on Thursday, we're planning to share a welcome drink or two in the evening.


- Friday, July 19 -

Enjoying the lake

On Friday, we'd love to have some fun in the sun on Lake Tahoe with anyone who wants to join.


- Saturday, July 20 -

The big day

The ceremony and reception will be held at Heavenly Mountain Resort, Lakeview Lodge (park at 3860 Saddle Rd. and ride the tram up!). We'll kick things off around 4 and keep the party going until the wee hours.


- Sunday, July 21 -

So long, farewell

On Sunday morning, we'll share a brunch and reminisce before bidding you adieu.

Need anything? Email us.

Paige Dunn-Rankin and Jordan Schwartz are getting married on July 20, 2019 at Heavenly Mountain Resort in Lake Tahoe. We can't wait to celebrate with you!
